name: Bath Cupcakes
description:
Fizzy base enriched with high quality ingredients. Topping is made of real sugar and dissolves beautifully. Don't worry, it's not sticky!  You'll leave the tub glistening with specks of body-safe glitter. 

Ingredients: Sodium bicarbonate, citric acid, cocoa butter, coconut oil, grapeseed oil,

name: Personalized Lip Balm
description:
12 x single flavor, super moisturizing lip balm made from scratch - a secret fairy recipe. Not tested on animals, fairy approved.

PERSONALIZED/PRIVATE LABELS
- Label design
- Please include your chosen text in the Notes section at purchase.
- Please include your choice of flavor in Notes section
- Ingredient listing and info label included.

Flavors: Strawberry, Banana, Cucumber Melon, Pumpkin Cheesecake, Vanilla Mint, Tropical. Convo for other flavors.

Each lip balm tube is shrink wrapped. Screw cap to break perforation.

Ingredients: Beeswax, coconut oil, cocoa butter, mango butter, jojoba oil, Vitamin E, color and flavor and/or essential oils. NET WT .15oz each. 


*** Please keep in a cool location! ***

name: Lip Balm by the tube
